articles.title: Russia-Ukraine live: Attacks near nuclear plant ahead of UN visit
articles.description: Russia and Ukraine blame each other for attacks on Energodar, home to Zaporizhzhia plant, ahead of UN inspectors visit.
articles.content: Russia has shelled Enerhodar, home to Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant, ahead of a visit by UN inspectors, according to Ukraine officials.
